manifest.author: ichichikin
manifest.description: Interactivity allows you to run shell commands and scripts directly within your notes, providing their output right alongside your written content, making your note-taking process more dynamic and interactive.
manifest.name: Interactivity: Calculations and Scripts

data.manifestValue: Interactivity allows you to run shell commands and scripts directly within your notes, providing their output right alongside your written content, making your note-taking process more dynamic and interactive.
data.communityListValue: Interactivity lets you run local shell commands and scripts directly within your notes, providing the output alongside your written content. Use your favorite tools like Python, Node.js, Java, Perl, PHP, bash, or any other REPLs while taking notes.
